title: Elon Musk's Pivot to X Draws Strong Opinions Across Twitter
description: The latest move by the billionaire owner to remake the platform elicits excitement and dismay from users, shrugs from advertisers.

title: Cleaning Up ChatGPT's Language Takes Heavy Toll on Human Workers
description: Contractors in Kenya say they were traumatized by effort to screen out descriptions of violence and sexual abuse during run-up to OpenAI’s hit chatbot.
